body:
I could run conformance testing on a local cluster before, but it does not work last week.

```
# cat /root/bin/mye2e.sh 
#!/bin/bash

export KUBECONFIG=/etc/kubernetes/kubectl.kubeconfig
export KUBERNETES_CONFORMANCE_TEST=y
export KUBECTL_PATH=/usr/bin/kubectl
export KUBERNETES_PROVIDER=local
export KUBE_ROOT=/home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes

GINKGO_PARALLEL=y go run /home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/e2e.go --v --root=$KUBE_ROOT --test --test_args="--ginkgo.focus=\[Conformance\] --ginkgo.skip=\[Serial\]"
```

```
# mye2e.sh 
2016/06/06 14:14:49 e2e.go:212: Running: get status
Local doesn't need special preparations for e2e tests
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"2", GitVersion:"v1.2.0", GitCommit:"a4463d9a1accc9c61ae90ce5d314e248f16b9f05", GitTreeState:"clean"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"2", GitVersion:"v1.2.0", GitCommit:"a4463d9a1accc9c61ae90ce5d314e248f16b9f05", GitTreeState:"clean"}
2016/06/06 14:14:50 e2e.go:214: Step 'get status' finished in 1.065657657s
Local doesn't need special preparations for e2e tests
2016/06/06 14:14:51 e2e.go:212: Running: Ginkgo tests
Conformance test: not doing test setup.
/home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cluster/../cluster/../cluster/gce/util.sh: line 38: gcloud: command not found
/home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cluster/../cluster/../cluster/gce/util.sh: line 38: gcloud: command not found
/home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cluster/../cluster/../cluster/gce/util.sh: line 38: gcloud: command not found
!!! Error in /home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/../cluster/common.sh:267
  'KUBE_MASTER_URL=$("${KUBE_ROOT}/cluster/kubectl.sh" config view -o jsonpath="{.clusters[?(@.name == \"${cluster}\")].cluster.server}")' exited with status 127
Call stack:
  1: /home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/../cluster/common.sh:267 detect-master-from-kubeconfig(...)
  2: /home/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/hack/ginkgo-e2e.sh:51 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
2016/06/06 14:14:51 e2e.go:218: Error running Ginkgo tests: exit status 1
2016/06/06 14:14:51 e2e.go:214: Step 'Ginkgo tests' finished in 79.587138ms
exit status 1
```

The reason is `KUBERNETES_PROVIDER` is reset to "" in hack/ginkgo-e2e.sh, and `cluster/kubectl.sh` in `detect-master-from-kubeconfig` will source `cluster/kube-util.sh` again, which set `KUBERNETES_PROVIDER` to `gce` this time.
title: Could not run conformance testing on local cluster
